document.full_text: scandal-tainted designer john galliano has been fired from his own fashion label just weeks after an anti-semitic outburst cost him his top job at dior, women's wear daily (wwd) reported on friday.
document.title: disgraced galliano fired from own fashion label: report
lines_and_colors: scandal-tainted designer john galliano has been fired from his own fashion label just weeks after an anti-semitic outburst cost him his top job at dior, women's wear daily (wwd) reported on friday.
